desc.name: 火种复苏
desc.desc: 菲利普的最大血量和混乱抗性提升100%. 每一幕结束时菲利普恢复自身烧伤层数的血量

desc.name: Rekindled Ember
desc.desc:
Philip's Max Hp and Stagger Resist increase by +100%.
At the end of each Scene, Philip recovers health equal to his Burn stacks.

desc.name: 无尽枷锁
desc.desc: 菲利普使用一张书页获取2次拼点胜利便对目标这一幕施加1层拘束

desc.name: Endless Shackle
desc.desc: After Philip wins 2 clashes with one Page, inflict 1 Restraint upon target this Scene.

desc.name: 烟气生产
desc.desc: 艾琳的进攻方式变为更注重于给自己获得烟气

desc.name: Smoke Manufacturer
desc.desc: Eileen's attack pattern switches to one specifying in gaining Smoke.

desc.name: 齿轮降神
desc.desc: 艾琳改为每4幕使用1张特殊书页"思想齿轮-降神","思想齿轮-降神"的骰子数值提升至16-28

desc.name: Deus ex Calces
desc.desc:
Eileen will use 'Thought Gear: Advent' every 4 Scenes instead.
The die of 'Thought Gear: Advent' is enhanced to 16-28.

desc.name: 骑士之愿
desc.desc: 格蕾塔的'庇护'提供的守护和振奋层数提升至5

desc.name: Wish of Guardianship
desc.desc: 'Knight in Shining Denticles' will instead give 5 Protection and Stagger Protection

desc.name: 饕餮之愿
desc.desc: 格蕾塔每幕都会使用1次鲨口惊魂.鲨口惊魂后3个骰子基础值提升3点.

desc.name: Wish of Gluttery
desc.desc:
Greta will use 'Tackle Mount' every Scene.
Increase Tackle Mount's last 3 dice natural roll by +3.

desc.name: 尽情高歌
desc.desc: 不来梅最大混乱抗性提升90, '颠倒战歌'提供给司书的强壮忍耐敏捷层数减少至1

desc.name: Solo Jazz
desc.desc:
Increase Bremen's Stagger Resist by 90.
Reduce Strength, Endurance, Haste gained from 'Erlöschend Dirge of a War Grave' to 1 stack.

desc.name: 振奋共歌
desc.desc: 不来梅对友方单位使用书页会恢复所有我方单位的混乱抗性30点

desc.name: Gospel Choir
desc.desc: When Bremen uses a Page on an ally unit, recover 30 Stagger Resist for all allies.

desc.name: It's Showtime!
desc.desc: 奥斯瓦尔德使用'好戏开始把~'后额外召唤一个超级兔子大宝贝. 利刃先生, 美人鱼小姐和超级兔子大宝贝的血量上限提升100,混乱抗性上限提升50.

desc.name: It's Showtime!
desc.desc:
After Oswald using 'Shall We Start the Show ~ ?', additional Mx. Bunny is summoned.
Mr. Knife, Mrs. Mermaid and Mx. Bunny's Max Hp is increased by 100, Max Stagger Resist is increased by 50.

desc.name: 顶级演出
desc.desc: 提升奥斯瓦尔德的'ShowTime~'的混乱伤害至4-8.每一幕至多承受最大生命值25%的伤害.

desc.name: Top Show
desc.desc:
Stagger Damage from Oswald's 'Showtime~' is boosted to 4-8.
Can take at most 25% of max hp of damage each scene.

desc.name: 头狼
desc.desc: 塔尼亚进攻方式变得更加激进. 进攻骰威力+1且命中目标时追加3-5点伤害

desc.name: Matriarch Wolf
desc.desc:
Tanya's attack pattern become more aggressive.
Her Offensive Dice gain +1 Power and deal 3-5 additional Damage on Hit.

desc.name: 风沙残蚀
desc.desc: 提升塔尼亚的'风卷残云'的伤害至6-10. 战斗开始时获得3个5-8防御反击骰.

desc.name: Eroding Sandstorm
desc.desc:
Damage from Tanya's 'Fierce Sandstorm' is boosted to 6-10.
Gain three Counter die (Defense, 5-8) at combat start.

desc.name: 傀儡戏
desc.desc: 每一幕开始时若在宪存活, 没有红线状态的司书会获得1层'操纵'. '操纵'骰子使用的书页费用+2

desc.name: Puppet Show
desc.desc:
At the start of each Scene if Jaeheon is alive, all librarians without Red String will be inflicted 1 'Puppet String'.
Increase cost of Pages used by uncontrolled die from 'Puppet String' by +2.

desc.name: 纠缠乱网
desc.desc: 红线的费用提升2点,而且其骰子基础值降低至23-23. 在宪最大血量和混乱抗性提升100%.

desc.name: Entangled Mess
desc.desc:
Cost of Red String is increased by 2, and its die's natural roll reduce to 23-23. 
Increase Jaeheon's Max Hp and Stagger Resist by +100%.

desc.name: 不死传闻
desc.desc: 伊莲娜最大血量上限提升200, 承受伤害减少25%.

desc.name: Unending Legend
desc.desc: Increase Elena's Max Hp by 200. Reduce incoming Damage by 25%.

desc.name: 鲜血为薪
desc.desc: 伊莲娜使用近战书页造成伤害时恢复造成伤害量的血量.若血量低于50%百分比则回血量翻倍

desc.name: Blood is Fuel
desc.desc:
Elena recover health equal to Damage dealt with Melee Page succesful hits.
If hp is lower than 50% then health recovered through this way is doubled.

desc.name: 激进协商
desc.desc: 普鲁托会改为使用书页时施加'非正当合同'效果. 司书的非正当合同费用+2.

desc.name: Aggressive Negotiation
desc.desc:
Pluto will instead inflict 'Unjust Contract' when using specific Pages. 
Librarians' Unjust Counterpart Pages have their cost increased by +2.

desc.name: 完美复制
desc.desc: 普鲁托生成阴影时会复制目标司书所有被动

desc.name: Perfect Replica
desc.desc: Pluto will copy all passives the target librarian has when spawning a shade.

desc.name: 奏鸣曲式
desc.desc:
阿尔加利亚的'高潮'改为每两幕结束时触发其效果. 
舞台开启时提升所有单位情感等级2级

desc.name: Forma-sonata
desc.desc:
Argalia's 'Emozioni Intensificantesi' will be triggered at the end of every 2 Scenes.
 At the start of each Act, all characters' Emotion Levels rise by 2.

desc.name: 三段曲式
desc.desc: 阿尔加利亚的'高潮'会每次触发时提升所有友方单位50%造成的伤害和混乱伤害.所有单位最大生命值提升100,最大混乱抗性提升50

desc.name: Forma-Ternaria
desc.desc:
Argalia's 'Emozioni Intensificantesi' will grant increased Damage and Stagger Damage by +25% for all allies when triggered.
All characters' Max Hp is increased by 100 and Max Stagger Resist is increased by 50.
